thread.section_title: Fabletics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fabletics | fabletics.com | 37 of 564
thread.title: Hillary Paton

author: Hillary Paton
title: Hillary Paton
text:
So little inventory! I was really disappointed.
Every time I clicked on something I liked the colors I liked were sold out, multiple sizes were sold out & at times they were either sold out completely or had one of the item left in stock at all. Leggings, capris, tanks, everything. Stop running your ads if you don't have the inventory to accomidate the traffic - it makes you look bad.
